statements: SELECT id, product_name, date, demand, inventory_level FROM historical_data;
SELECT product_name, date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, date FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_demand > 500;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_demand > 500 ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT product_name, AVG(inventory_level) AS avg_inventory, MAX(inventory_level) AS max_inventory FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT product_name, date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01' AND demand BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT id, date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, inventory_level FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM historical_data;
SELECT date, replenishment_qty, supplier_id FROM inventory_replenishment WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, date, demand, inventory_level FROM historical_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_replenishment WHERE supplier_id = 1234 ORDER BY date ASC, replenishment_qty DESC;
SELECT id, date, demand FROM historical_data WHERE demand > 100 AND inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY demand DESC, inventory_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_replenishment WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, demand, inventory_level FROM historical_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND inventory_level < 20 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM historical_sales ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50 ORDER BY last_replenishment_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, date, product_id, quantity FROM historical_sales WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales ORDER BY date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 AND last_replenishment_date < '2022-01-01'

SELECT hs.order_id, hs.quantity, pd.product_name, pd.category, i.quantity_in_stock FROM historical_sales hs JOIN product_details pd ON hs.product_id = pd.product_id JOIN inventory i ON hs.product_id = i.product_id WHERE hs.quantity > 10 ORDER BY hs.quantity DESC

SELECT hs.date, pd.product_name, i.quantity_in_stock, i.last_replenishment_date FROM historical_sales hs INNER JOIN product_details pd ON hs.product_id = pd.product_id INNER JOIN inventory i ON hs.product_id = i.product_id WHERE pd.category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM historical_demand_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, demand FROM historical_demand_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_information WHERE unit_price >= 10.00;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM product_information GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM historical_demand_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_information WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_information ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM product_information JOIN demand_forecast ON product_information.product_id = demand_forecast.product_id WHERE forecast_date = '2022-06-01';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_replenished FROM inventory_replenishment
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM product_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT demand_amount, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT replenishment_date, replenishment_quantity FROM inventory_replenishment ORDER BY replenishment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_phone FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM product_data WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT sale_date, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM sale_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_sales FROM sale_data GROUP BY product_id;
